name: Delta of Invitation
text: When this card is activated: You can send 1 Level 5 or higher Zombie monster from your Deck to the GY. You can only use each of the following effects of "Delta of Invitation" once per turn. If a Zombie monster is on the field: You can Special Summon 1 "Delta Token" (Zombie/DARK/Level 5/ATK 0/DEF 0). If a monster(s) is added from the GY to the hand, while this card is in your GY (except during the Damage Step): You can add this card to your hand. You can only activate 1 "Delta of Invitation" per turn.
